mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_link_network_stats ( full_short_url, gid, date, cnt, network, create_time, update_time, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{fullShortUrl}, #{gid}, #{date}, #{cnt}, #{network}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE cnt = cnt + #{cnt}, update_time = #{updateTime};
mapper.select: SELECT network, SUM(cnt) AS cnt FROM t_link_network_stats lns WHERE lns.gid = #{requestParam.gid} AND lns.date BETWEEN #{requestParam.startDate} AND #{requestParam.endDate} GROUP BY lns.network
